PHRASE.LANG: kName
nFashion - Harajuku Male Clothing Bundle
nFashion - Lot de vêtements pour homme Harajuku
nFashion - Harajuku-Kleidungsstücke-Bundle (Mann)
nFashion - Pacchetto Abbigliamento Harajuku uomo
nFashion: lote de ropa Harajuku para hombre
nFashion - ハラジュク男性用衣装セット
nFashion - Harajuku Male Clothing Bundle
nFashion - Harajuku Male Clothing Bundle
nFashion - Harajuku Male Clothing Bundle
nFashion - Harajuku Male Clothing Bundle
nFashion - Harajuku Male Clothing Bundle
kDesc

Stand out on the streets of PlayStation®Home with these Harajuku inspired clothing items. This bundle includes: 
 

* nFashion - Harajuku Boots (Male) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Boots (Male) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Boots (Male) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Shoes (Male) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Shoes (Male) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Shoes (Male) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Goggles (Male) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Goggles (Male) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Goggles (Male) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Cap (Male) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Cap (Male) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Cap (Male) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Pants (Male) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Pants (Male) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Pants (Male) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Shorts (Male) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Shorts (Male) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Shorts (Male) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Tee (Male) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Tee (Male) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Tee (Male) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Blazer (Male) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Blazer (Male) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Harajuku Blazer (Male) (Version 3) 
 

※ Upon purchase, all items will be added to their corresponding categories. [#Legal]

Faites-vous remarquer dans les rues de PlayStation®Home avec ces vêtements d'inspiration Harajuku. Ce lot comporte :

 * nFashion - Short Harajuku (Homme) (Version 1)

 * nFashion - T-Shirt Harajuku (Homme) (Version 3) 
 * nFashion – Blouson Harajuku (Homme) (Version 1) 
 * nFashion - Blouson Harajuku (Homme) (Version 2) 
 * nFashion - Blouson Harajuku (Homme) (Version 3) 
 

※ À l’achat, chaque objet sera ajouté à sa catégorie correspondante. [#Legal]
